name: api
description: Backend API endpoints for the Manifold website.

scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn --cwd=../../common alias && yarn --cwd=../shared alias && yarn alias && yarn dist
scripts.dev: nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src -e ts --watch ../../common/src --watch ../shared/src --exec "yarn build && node --inspect-brk lib/serve.js"
scripts.dist:prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/common/lib dist/backend/shared/lib dist/backend/api/lib
scripts.dist:copy: cp -R ../../common/lib/* dist/common/lib && cp -R ../shared/lib/* dist/backend/shared/lib && cp -R ./lib/* dist/backend/api/lib && cp ../../yarn.lock dist && cp package.json dist
